definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

pinyin: Heng2 sheng1 Zhong1 zi1 qi3 ye4 zhi3 shu4

sentences.english: This is the second such event I attended during my six months in London.
sentences.chinese: 这是我到任半年以来第二次出席中资机构的乔迁仪式。

sentences.english: Skeptics say Chinese bank stocks might not recover their lost ground.
sentences.chinese: 怀疑论者认为，中资银行股或许无法收复失地。

sentences.english: Chinese-owned enterprises have pumped money into Zambia's mining sector in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，中资企业一直在向赞比亚的采矿业注资。

sentences.english: But the China capital organization will repeatedly violate a regulation will lay down without doubt for a next huger disaster the foreshadowing.
sentences.chinese: 而中资机构屡次犯规无疑将为今后更大灾害埋下伏笔。

sentences.english: Huaxia will certainly not be the last Chinese lender to raise capital.
sentences.chinese: 华夏银行当然不会是最后一家要融资的中资银行。

sentences.english: Go to any Chinese based business anywhere and you can count the foreign employees on one hand.
sentences.chinese: 任何一个中资公司里边的外籍雇员一只手就可以数完。

sentences.english: Chinese banks lend for commodity purchases with the underlying commodities as collaterals.
sentences.chinese: 中资银行为大宗商品购买放款，并以该商品作为抵押。

sentences.english: Prokopovich also refused to name the Chinese bank.
sentences.chinese: 普罗科波维奇还拒绝透露这家中资银行名称。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, China will also safeguard the safety and legitimate rights and interests of Chinese enterprises and personnel.
sentences.chinese: 同时中方也将保障中资企业和人员的安全及合法权益。

definition: red chip stocks (Chinese company stocks incorporated outside mainland China and listed in the Hong Kong stock exchange)
Hong Kong and Shanghai Banking Corporation (HSBC)
to own a controlling number of shares in a company
the Stars and Stripes (US flag)/by extension, the United States of America/abbr. for Citibank 花旗銀行|花旗银行
merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over
same trade or business/person in the same trade or business
Hong Kong Stock Exchange/abbr. for 香港交易所
